notes.variables: List all Vensim model variables you want to extract
notes.groups: Add student group names to filter by specific groups
notes.model_name: Set to your Vensim model name if needed (e.g., 'CyberRisk.vmf')
notes.inputs: F1-F4 represent percentages of IT budget: F1=prevention, F2=detection, F3=response, F4=recovery
notes.outputs: Main outputs: compromised_systems, profits, accumulated_profit. Additional: systems_at_risk, fraction_to_make_profits, impact_on_business
